titles.title: Deep Deep Oh Deep Down Down
Do You Love Your Jesus

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Deep, deep oh deep down down
Deep down in my heart, I love you Jesus
Deep, deep oh deep down down
Deep down in my heart

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Do you love your Jesus,
Deep down in your heart
Yes I love My Jesus,
Deep Down in my heart!
